docs.snippet: England coach Roy Hodgson retains the support of the Football Association despite the team's dismal showing at the World Cup last month, FA Chairman Greg Dyke said on Tuesday....

docs.snippet: Administrators at Hobart and William Smith Colleges in central New York are pressed for changes over how a campus panel handled a freshman’s complaint....
docs.lead_paragraph: Administrators at Hobart and William Smith Colleges in central New York are pressed for changes over how a campus panel handled a freshman’s complaint.
docs.abstract: Students and alumni at Hobart and William Smith Colleges in central New York are grappling with questions raised by New York Times article examining school’s handling of sexual assault complaint filed by female student; broad show of support for student has led to president Mark D Gearan to say that school is re-evaluating its sexual assault policies.

headline.main: Support for a College Student Grows After a Rape Complaint Is Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Support for a College Student Grows After a Rape Complaint Is Dismissed
